Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber<PlayerAction>
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber<PlayerAction>
Handles game related logic via Action legality checks and execution. It's the outer most level used by the server to interact with a running game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Controller​(Game game)
    Gets instantiated when the model abstraction (a Game Object) has already been created.

  • Method Summary

    Communicates to the RemoteView and to the Model that the player with the nickname passed as parameter has connected.

    Communicates to the RemoteView and to the Model that the player with the nickname passed as parameter has disconnected.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller​(Game game)
      Gets instantiated when the model abstraction (a Game Object) has already been created. After this point, the game passed as parameter is running.
      Parameters:
      game - Game instance associated 1:1 with the controller.

  • Method Details

    • setRemoteView

      public void setRemoteView​(RemoteView remoteView)
      Handles the linking between Model and server-side View by subscribing the latter to the former.
      Parameters:
      remoteView - Server-side view that will received all updates from the Model associated with the Controller's game attribute.

    • connectPlayer

      public void connectPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, Connection connection)
      Communicates to the RemoteView and to the Model that the player with the nickname passed as parameter has connected. The player will start receiving Model updates.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Connected Player's nickname.
      connection - Connection Object associated with the passed nickname's Player. Will receive all Model updates.

    • disconnectPlayer

      public void disconnectPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Communicates to the RemoteView and to the Model that the player with the nickname passed as parameter has disconnected. The server will stop sending Model updates to that player's Connection object.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Disconnected Player's nickname.

    • onSubscribe

      public void onSubscribe​(java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscription subscription)
      Specified by:
      onSubscribe in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber<PlayerAction>

    • onNext

      public void onNext​(PlayerAction playerAction)
      Specified by:
      onNext in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber<PlayerAction>

    • onError

      public void onError​(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
      Specified by:
      onError in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber<PlayerAction>

    • onComplete

      public void onComplete()
      Specified by:
      onComplete in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber<PlayerAction>
